details: Weaker opponents refer to enemies lower level than you

build: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/shadowstep.png} tip={Shadowstep}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/uncanny-luck.png} tip={Uncanny Luck}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/the-way-of-shadows.png} tip={The Way of Shadows}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-thrash.png} tip={Chain Arts: Thrash}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-scimitar.png} tip={Summon Scimitar}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-pursuit.png} tip={Chain Arts: Pursuit}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/weapon-mastery.png} tip={Weapon Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/weapon-booster.png} tip={Weapon Booster}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-thrash-ii.png} tip={Chain Arts: Thrash II}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/wisdom-of-shadows.png} tip={Wisdom of Shadows}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-claw.png} tip={Summon Claw}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shuriken.png} tip={Summon Shuriken}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory-ii.png} tip={Muscle Memory II}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-thrash-iii.png} tip={Chain Arts: Thrash III}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/determination.png} tip={Determination}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/cheap-shot.png} tip={Cheap Shot}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/keen-eye.png} tip={Keen Eye}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-decoy-bomb.png} tip={Summon Decoy Bomb}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-daggers.png} tip={Summon Daggers}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shotgun.png} tip={Summon Shotgun}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory-iii.png} tip={Muscle Memory III}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-thrash-iv.png} tip={Chain Arts: Thrash IV}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/weapons-expert.png} tip={Weapons Expert}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/cheap-shot-ii.png} tip={Cheap Shot II}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/wisdom-of-shadows-ii.png} tip={Wisdom of Shadows II}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/nova-warrior.png} tip={Nova Warrior}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-spiked-bat.png} tip={Summon Spiked Bat}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-brick.png} tip={Summon Brick}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-beatdown.png} tip={Chain Arts: Beatdown}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-reign-of-chains.png} tip={Chain Arts: Reign of Chains}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/nova-temperance.png} tip={Nova Temperance}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
For Earlygame:

  • Chain Arts: Thrash - Reinforce
  • Chain-less Arts - Critical Chance and Boss Rush
  • Chain Arts: Beatdown - Shockwave Reinforce and Cooldown Cutter

For Midgame/Endgame:

Chain Arts: Beatdown has limited use midgame/endgame especially in parties such as Lucid or Will. The skill is mainly used to gain max stacks of Muscle Memory

  • Chain-less Arts - Reinforce and Boss Rush
  • Chain Arts: Thrash - Reinforce and Linked Attack Reinforce
  • Chain Arts: Beatdown - Cooldown Cutter

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
Tertiary Trio
*
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first and so on
  • The last skill from the Tertiary Trio can be any skill as Cadena only has 8 skills to boost
  • 6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time
nodeInfo.possible: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-reign-of-chains.png} tip={Thrash, Muscle Memory, and Reign of Chains (1st Job / 2nd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-scimitar.png} tip={Summon Scimitar and Summon Claw (1st Job / 2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-daggers.png} tip={Summon Daggers and Summon Shuriken (3rd Job / 2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shotgun.png} tip={Summon Shotgun and Summon Decoy Bomb (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-brick.png} tip={Summon Brick (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-beatdown.png} tip={Chain Arts: Beatdown (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-spiked-bat.png} tip={Summon Spiked Bat (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/veteran-shadowdealer.png} tip={Crush and Veteran Shadowdealer (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to SgtPickles for their help in making this overview!

extraContent.title: Muscle Memory & Dark Sight
extraContent.content:
Cadena's skills can summon several different weapons to defeat enemies. After 2nd Job, each time a unique weapon is summoned, gain a stack of Muscle Memory buff. For each stack, you gain increased %Final Damage. Below is a list of skills that trigger Muscle Memory:

  • Summon Scimitar (1st Job)
  • Summon Claw (2nd Job)
  • Summon Shuriken (2nd Job)
  • Summon Shotgun (3rd Job)
  • Summon Daggers (3rd Job)
  • Summon Decoy Bombs (3rd Job)
  • Summon Brick (4th Job)
  • Summon Spiked Bat (4th Job)
  • Chain Arts: Reign of Chains (4th Job) refreshes Muscle Memory but does not add a stack
  • Chain Arts: Beatdown (4th Job) grants a full stack of Muscle Memory

Dark Sight

Credits to the Night Walker Discord for the list of attacks avoidable with Dark Sight. For an actively maintained version, please check out the Night Walker Discord

In 1st Job, using Chain Arts: Pursuit will grant Dark Sight state. As well, in 4th Job, activating the additional chain attack from Muscle Memory III will also grant Dark Sight state. Below is a list of avoidable attacks that have been tested:

BossAvoidable Attack
All EnemiesTouch Damage
HillaLightning Bolt, Flame Breath
CygnusAll minions (including instructors) touch damage + attacks
UrsusFalling Debris
Princess No(Miroku/4F - All attacks except Infinite Flame), Butterfly Throw (except Black Butterfly Seduce), Sakura Shower
MagnusImmobilizing Gas, Falling Debris, Dash
PapulatusHand Smash, Floor Rift, Timed Cursed/Seal (both cast + seal), Falling Debris
GolluxReverse/99% Bomb
Crimson QueenBurn DoT (gain stacks but no damage taken)
PierreFalling Hats, Fire Spin (Blue Form)
Von BonFalling Debris
VellumFalling Stun Rocks
Pink Bean (Statuses)All attacks except Laser, Poison Clouds, Mini Pink Beans
Pink BeanBlue ground attack, Big Bang, Mini Pink Beans
LotusP2 Stun Debris
DamienYellow(p1)/Red(p2) Falling Fireballs, Dash(p2), Thorn Bind (Can be done reactively when he disappears w/ Monster Silhouettes enabled in settings)
WillP1 (Segment Test) Red Meteors, P2 Web, P2 Dash
Guardian Angel SlimeSlime Pool DoT, Slime minion touch damage (not their attacks, i.e. Pink Slime's seduce), Magma Slime touch + landing on head
Verus HillaCorpse DoT
GloomFalling Debris
DarknellDebris (Both Vertical + Horizontal), Small Minion touch damage (except sword swing)
Black MageP1 Knights' Dash (still applies curse), P1 Red Lightning, Falling Debris (Vertical), Diagonal/Rolling Debris (only while midair), P3 Down FMA
SerenDash, Falling Debris (P1, P2 Sunset); still adds sun gauge

primary.name: Haggle
primary.shortDesc: Purchase items 4% cheaper at shops. Does not apply if the purchase cost is above 70% of the sales cost.\nWhen stacked with the Merchandising guild skill, the higher figure is applied first.
details: When stacked with Guild Skill <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/merchandising.png} tip={Merchandising (Guild Skill)}> Merchandising, the higher discount will be applied first

primary.name: Back to HQ
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Moves you to the Shadowdealers Hideout.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/214/Pioneer_of_Destiny} title={"Pioneer of Destiny"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Chain Arts: Pursuit
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 100%, Number of Attacks: 1, 100% chance to slow enemies for 5 sec. Enables Dark Sight state. Cannot be hit for 2 sec. after you start moving.\nWhen you move, if you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP by using Dark Sight, Dark Sight's remaining time will be reduced by 20% of its maximum.\nCooldown: 0.2 sec
primary.desc: Fire a grapple that can attach to enemies or terrain
details: Pressing an Arrow Key and Skill Key together allows you to direct the chain at a 45° angle upwards/downwards or straight if no Arrow Key is pressed

Upon use, the chain will attach to the target and apply a slow debuff if it is an enemy<bp_Pressing again will move you towards the target_While moving, you temporarily enter a <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state and cannot be hit_While in the <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state, if you dodge an attack that deals %Max HP, the duration is reduced slightly_>
Based on how long the Skill Key is held, the grapple distance will increase
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Chain Arts: Thrash
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 13,
[1st Hit] Damage: 150%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 2
[2nd Hit] Damage: 150%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 2, 100% chance of slowing enemies for 5 sec.
Skills used immediately after 1st hit gain +10% Final Damage (Excludes Chain Arts: Thrash).
primary.desc: Lash your whip forward that applies a slow debuff to enemies hit
details: The attack consists of two parts, the initial lash and the returning lash
Other skills can be used between the initial lash and returning lash<bp_Skills used immediately after the initial lash will deal increased %Final Damage (excluding returning lash)_>
The returning lash will push back enemies

primary.name: Summon Scimitar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Damage: 125%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 5\nCooldown: 4 sec
primary.desc: Dash forward while slicing through enemies
details: While casting, you cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Shadowstep
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, allows you to jump a greater distance
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>
Horizontal jump can be used twice in a row

primary.name: The Way of Shadows
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +40, Jump: +20, Max Speed: +20, Avoidability: +15%

primary.name: Uncanny Luck
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 50

primary.name: Chain Arts: Thrash II
primary.shortDesc: Chain Arts: Thrash 2nd Hit Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
details: Increases %Damage and number of hits of 2nd hit

primary.name: Summon Claw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 235%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 4\nCooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: Slash downwards to the platform below
details: While casting, you cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Can only be used while in the air

primary.name: Summon Shuriken
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Strikes for 205% damage 40 times over 7 sec. Automatically explodes once all attacks are expended, or when duration ends. Explosion deals 450% damage to 8 enemies 3 times.\nPress the skill key again to manually detonate the shuriken\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Create a moving shuriken that pushes enemies while it moves
details: After a short period or pressing the Skill Key again, the shuriken will explode damaging nearby enemies
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Weapon Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Increases attack speed of all weapons for 200 sec.

primary.name: Muscle Memory
primary.shortDesc: Triggers upon switching summoned weapons. [Stack Bonus] Attack Skill Final Damage +3% per stack, for 30 sec. Stacks up to the number of weapon summon skills you possess (excluding Chain Arts).\nRefreshing this buff stack inflicts additional hits. [Bonus Hits] Damage: 100%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 2, Cooldown: 0.2 sec.\n[Passive Effect: Damage for Scimitar +80%p]
primary.desc: Whenever a new Summon weapon skill is used, an additional attack will activate damaging nearby enemies
details: For each unique Summon weapon skill used, gain a stacking %Final Damage buff<bp_Each activation will refresh the buff duration_>
Additionally, permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-scimitar.png} tip={Summon Scimitar (1st Job)}> by a flat amount
Unaffected by %Buff Duration and cooldown resets

primary.name: Weapon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Mastery with Chain, and all Summoned Weapons increased by 50%.

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Wisdom of Shadows
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +10, Critical Damage: +5%, Critical Rate: +10%, Avoidability: +20%

primary.name: Chain Arts: Thrash III
primary.shortDesc: Chain Arts: Thrash 2nd Hit Damage: 300%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 4
details: Increases %Damage of 2nd hit
Increases number of hits and max enemies hit

primary.name: Summon Shotgun
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 7
Close Range Damage: 390%
Mid Range Damage: 320%
Long Range Damage: 275%
Cooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Fire a shotgun forward damaging enemies and recoiling you backwards
details: The damage of the attack will vary based on the distance the enemy is to the attack
While casting, you cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Summon Daggers
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 315%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 8. Enemies struck will have a 100% chance to become Terrified for 30 sec, reducing their Defense by 30%.\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Slashe upwards to deal damage vertically while inflicting a debuff
details: [Debuff]: Reduces %DEF<bp_Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF_>

primary.name: Summon Decoy Bomb
primary.shortDesc: Places a bomb that explodes after 1 sec. MP Cost: 40, Damage: 415%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 6\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Leap backwards and throw bombs at your current location
details: While casting, you cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Bombs explode after a short delay
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Muscle Memory II
primary.shortDesc:
Triggers upon switching summoned weapons. [Stack Bonus] Attack Skill Final Damage +7% per stack, for 30 sec. Stacks up to the number of weapon summon skills you possess (excluding Chain Arts).
Refreshing or incrementing this buff stack inflicts additional hits. [Bonus Hits] Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
Cooldown for Bonus Hits: 0.2 sec
[Passive Effects - Damage for Summon Scimitar, Claw, Shuriken +100%p]
details: Increases %Final Damage provided per stack
Increases %Damage, number of hits, and max enemies hit

Additionally, permanently increases the %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-scimitar.png} tip={Summon Scimitar (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-claw.png} tip={Summon Claw (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shuriken.png} tip={Summon Shuriken (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Determination
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Cheap Shot
primary.shortDesc: Your attacks against enemies affected by Abnormal Statuses gain Critical Rate: +1%, Critical Damage +5%, Max Eligible Targets: 5
details: %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage gained is based on how many debuffs an enemy has
Up to only 5 debuffs are counted, thus the bonus stacks up to 5 times

primary.name: Keen Eye
primary.shortDesc: Ignore DEF: +20%, Damage: +20%, Avoidability: +40%

primary.name: Chain Arts: Thrash IV
primary.shortDesc: Chain Arts: Thrash 2nd Hit Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 5
details: Increases %Damage and number of hits of 2nd hit

primary.name: Summon Brick
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 535%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 7\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Launch a huge brick while jumping forward
details: Pressing the Up Arrow Key and Skill Key together allows you to jump higher
While casting, you cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Summon Spiked Bat
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, [First Hit] Damage: 495%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 8
[2nd Hit] Damage: 640%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 8
[3rd Hit] Damage: 915%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 10
Enemies struck have a 100% chance to be confused. [Confusion] Duration: 30 sec, Enemy AttacK: -20%
Cooldown: 12 sec
primary.desc: Slam your bat consecutively forward that inflicts a debuff
details: [Debuff]: Reduces %Attack
Can be used up to 3 times dealing increased damage each strike
If another skill is used before the final hit, the skill will go on cooldown and you cannot utilize the remaining hits

primary.name: Chain Arts: Reign of Chains
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost per attack: 25, Invincibility Duration: 2 sec
Damage: 600%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 2, Attack Duration: 6 sec,
Can use directional keys to move while holding the skill key.
Cooldown: 45 sec
primary.desc: While held, violently swing your chain to pull enemies in
details: Attack refreshes the <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> Muscle Memory buff but does not count as a stack
Upon casting, you are briefly invincible
You can move while casting
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Chain Arts: Beatdown
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 255, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 300%, Attacks: 2, Stun Duration: 10 sec. Increases stun duration up to 100% based on inflicted damage.
For 5 sec after casting, depending on the number of additional hits activated by Muscle Memory, follow-up attack is divided into 3 levels. If the number of activations isn't met within this time, Strike occurs at the minimum level.
Strike: Whem Muscle Memory number of activations is 0/3/5, respectively, attacks the group in their location based on the level with 770%/880%/990% damage, respectively, 15 times(s), and activates a final attack that attacks 10 enemies with 250%/350%/500% damage, respectively 10 time(s)
During the consecutive attacks, activates a shockwave that attacks up to 10 enemies with 600% damage 4 time(s). Additional DEF Ignored: +80%.
Cooldown: 120 sec
primary.desc: Bind nearby enemy and release a powerful attack
details: Based on the number of times <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> is activated, the strength of the attack increases

This skill will not count towards <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> Muscle Memory buff but will grant full stacks when used
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Nova Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Grandis Goddess appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Nova Temperance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Muscle Memory III
primary.shortDesc: Triggers upon switching summoned weapons. [Stack Bonus] Attack Skill Final Damage +10% for 30 sec. Stacks up to the number of weapon summon skills you possess (excluding Chain Arts).\nRefreshing or incrementing this buff stack inflicts additional hits. [Bonus Hits] Damage: 350%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 4, Cooldown: 0.2 sec\n[Passive Effect: Damage for Summon Scimitar, Claw, Shuriken, Shotgun, Daggers, and Decoy Bomb are all increased by +170%p]
details: Increases %Final Damage provided per stack
Increases %Damage, number of hits, and max enemies hit
Upon activating the additional chain attack, now enters Dark Sight state and grants a stacking %Max HP barrier that decays over time

Additionally, permanently increases the %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-scimitar.png} tip={Summon Scimitar (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-claw.png} tip={Summon Claw (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shuriken.png} tip={Summon Shuriken (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shotgun.png} tip={Summon Shotgun (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-daggers.png} tip={Summon Daggers (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-decoy-bomb.png} tip={Summon Decoy Bombs (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Cheap Shot II
primary.shortDesc: Damage Against Normal Monsters: +10%\nYour attacks against enemies affected by Abnormal Statuses gain Critical Rate +2% and Critical Damage +10%. Max Eligible Targets: 10\nBleed Chance: 50%, Bleed Duration: 30 sec, Bleed Damage: 110% over 1 sec
details: Increases %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage gained towards enemies affected by Abnormal Statuses
Increases max debuff stacks counted towards an enemy (from 5 to 10)
Now increases %Damage towards regular monsters
Now grants a chance to inflict a damaging bleed debuff

primary.name: Weapons Expert
primary.shortDesc: For chain and all Summoned Weapons - Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +50, Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +19%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Wisdom of Shadows II
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +10%, Boss Damage: +20%, Avoidability: +15%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

hyperPassive.name: Chain-less Arts: Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of summoned weapon attacks

hyperPassive.name: Chain-less Arts: Critical Chance
details: Increases %Crit Rate of summoned weapon attacks

hyperPassive.name: Chain-less Arts: Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of summoned weapon attacks

hyperPassive.name: Chain Arts: Thrash - Linked Attack Reinforce
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Final Damage of skills used immediately after 1 hit of Chain Arts: Thrash +5% (Excludes Chain Arts: Thrash).

hyperPassive.name: Chain Arts: Beatdown - Shockwave Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of the shockwaves triggered by the secondary attack

hyperActive.name: Veteran Shadowdealer
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Duration: 30 sec, Multiplies the effects of Muscle Memory by 2\nWhenever you summon a weapon or land a hit on an enemy, creates an explosion that deals 255% damage 3 times to up to 6 enemies.\nCooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Doubles the effects of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> Muscle Memory buff and creates an additional attack whenever you summon a weapon or land a hit on an enemy

hyperActive.name: Chain Arts: Crush
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Damage: 510%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 15\nMuscle Memory at max stacks on hit, Duration: 15 sec\nCooldown: 30 sec
hyperActive.desc: Chains crash down from the sky, damaging nearby enemies
details: Upon successful hit, grants max stacks of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> Muscle Memory buff that lasts a shorter duration

hyperActive.name: Shadowdealer's Elixir
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Chain Arts: Void Strike
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 80 sec. Creates giant chains that travel along an arbitrary path inflicting 770% damage 6 times to up to 10 enemies.\nChain Cooldown: 0.6 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, chains lash across the map damaging enemies in its path
details: Right-clicking the skill toggles the visual gray background ON/OFF
Unaffected by Damage Ignore and Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Apocalypse Cannon
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000. The cannon gathers energy for 10 sec, periodically inflicting 495% damage 5 times to up to 8 enemies at set intervals.\nAfter amassing enough energy, it creates a supernova that deals 1650% damage 8 times to up to 15 enemies.\nCooldown: 25 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon a cannon that deals damage while charging up to fire an energy ball
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Chain Arts: Maelstrom
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 250, Deals damage for 8 sec at a certain interval. Damage: 660%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 4. Upon attack, 100% chance to Slow enemies for 6 sec\nAttack speed gradually decreases based on time
fifthMain.desc: Create (at max 1) a maelstrom of chains that continuously deals damage and applies a slow debuff
details: Maelstrom gradually reduces attack speed until it disappears
Can only be used as a combo after using 2 Thrash hits or by pressing Down Arrow Key and Attack Key

fifthMain.name: Muscle Memory Finale
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 450, activates in location of nearby enemies upon hitting Muscle Memory additional hit 4 times
Additional Hit Activation: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 660%, Number of Attacks: 7
Muscle Memory Finale is prepared 1 each per 11 sec up to 3
Preparation time reduces by 2 sec when Chain Arts: Reign of Chains/Chain Arts: Beatdown/Chain Arts: Crush hits, reduces by 1 sec when Chain Arts: Void Strike hits
fifthMain.desc: Every 4 times <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> activates, chains will strike down onto enemies
details: Does not have a cooldown, instead stores charges (up to 3) and periodically prepares a charge

Using the following skills will decrease the charge time: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-reign-of-chains.png} tip={Chain Arts: Reign of Chains (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-beatdown.png} tip={Chain Arts: Beatdown (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-crush.png} tip={Chain Arts: Crush (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-void-strike.png} tip={Chain Arts: Void Strike (5th Job)}>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-reign-of-chains.png} tip={Thrash, Muscle Memory, and Reign of Chains (1st Job / 2nd Job / 4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Chain Arts: Thrash
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 20
1st hit - Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 2
2nd hit - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 560%, Number of Attacks: 5, Slow Chance: 100%, Slow Duration: 5 sec
Enhanced 2nd hit - Preparation Duration: every 10 sec, Max uses: 3
Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 560%, Number of Attacks: 5, Shockwave Damage: 990%, Number of Shockwave Attacks: 10
Skills used immediately after 1st hit gain +25% Final Damage (Excludes Chain Arts: Thrash).
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-reign-of-chains.png} tip={Thrash, Muscle Memory, and Reign of Chains (1st Job / 2nd Job / 4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Muscle Memory
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Triggers upon switching summoned weapons. [Stack Bonus] Attack Skill Final Damage: +11% for 30 sec. Stacks up to the number of weapon summon skills you possess (excluding Chains Arts).
Refreshing or incrementing this buff stack inflicts additional hits. [Bonus Hits] Damage: 660%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 4, Cooldown: 0.2 sec
When bonus hit triggers, Dark Sight Duration: 2 sec, Protective Shield: blocks 7% of Max HP
Protective Shield can accumulate as much as 25% of Max HP, and consumes 30% + 50 of the current Protective Shield per stack
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Chain Arts: Grand Arsenal
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Max Enemies Hit: 15
1st linked attack - Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 8, Chase Cuts: 54
2nd linked attack - Damage: 730%, Number of Attacks: 9, Chase Cuts: 17
3rd linked attack - Damage: 780%, Number of Attacks: 14, Explosions: 60
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Cadena is a fun and mobile class that utilizes a variety of weapons to create a combination of attacks. She is strong at mobbing but still has the skills to make this class exceptionally well at bossing. Skills that you gain in 1st job to 3rd job, you will still utilize in 4th job
